title: How can mother nature kill humans? - Quora

response.answer_text: Mother can feed us and the same mother can chastise us. When man thinks he can rough ride nature, little does he realize that he is pushing the pendulum one way and it’s only time when the pendulum swings back. Nature has no emotions unlike animals, birds and humans. It just goes about what it needs to do without compulsions. The cruelty that we see is within our minds.

Just type Corona VIrus and you will know. Time in and out, our forefathers have always focused on cleanliness and more. And what did we do? We broke their rules. and we are suffering. SHE never does anything. it is because of our actions, that devastation happens.
If people keep taking mother nature for granted and don't thank enough for giving birth to humanity then it's bound to happen.
